name: Minimaths
description:
Overview

A mini puzzle game that feature maths operations learned in school.

There are 3 levels of difficulty and 1 extra game mode

Primary school : Featuring basic maths operation (+ - *  ÷)

High school : Featuring exponential, combination, permutation, sequence

College :  Featuring fundamentals of algebra and calculas

Puzzle : A combined game mode, use less nodes to obtain the desired number

How to play:

Drag & Drop the nodes to make the number in crystal matches the number on red banner. 

PS: This game do not represent percise maths calculation. Some operations may not work in the game even they work in real situation.
